head.title: Delete signatures from {{FileFormatUp}} using {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Deletion of Digital, Barcode, Text, Image, Metadata signatures from signed {{FileFormatUp}} documents can be performed easily using {{ProdFullName}}.

header.title: Remove signatures from {{FileFormatUp}} efficiently
header.description: Beyond just signing business documents, our solution offers comprehensive tools to locate and remove a wide array of signatures using {{ProdFullName}}.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Overview of {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}})  is a robust signing tool that facilitates the addition of diverse signature types, ranging from text and images to barcodes, digital certificates, and stamps. Supporting over 60 file formats—including PDF, MS Office, images, ZIP, and other widely-used business formats—this solution ensures flexibility in document management. Additionally, applied signatures can be easily located, authenticated, modified, or removed as needed.

more_features.title: Optimize document management with advanced signature tools
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} is meticulously designed to enhance the signing and processing of business file formats, enabling the addition, modification, verification, or deletion of signatures with ease.

feature_1.title: Document signing
feature_1.content: Effortlessly embed text, image, barcode, QR code, or stamp signatures onto any page of supported documents. Additionally, utilize hidden metadata such as EXIF in images or safeguard document integrity with digital certificates, preventing unauthorized alterations.

feature_2.title: Signature search and verification
feature_2.content: Leverage our tools to ensure the authenticity of signatures within your documents. Conduct thorough searches to retrieve a complete list of all signatures, ensuring comprehensive document management.

feature_3.title: Signature modification
feature_3.content: Easily refine previously added signatures by adjusting text, repositioning, or altering colors to meet your specific needs.

feature_4.title: Signature deletion
feature_4.content: Our solution provides full CRUD capabilities for signatures, allowing you to efficiently remove a variety of signature types from your documents when necessary.

formats.title: Remove signatures across multiple file formats
formats.description: {{ProdFullName}} is engineered to facilitate the removal of signatures from an extensive range of over 60 file formats, ensuring broad compatibility and functionality.

operations.title: Check out our highlighted features
operations.description: We are excited to offer a wide selection of supported signature types and operations

steps.title: How to delete e-signatures from {{FileFormatUp}} using {{ProgLang}}

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) simplifies the task for {{EnvName}} developers to remove electronic signatures in {{FileFormatUp}} files by implementing a few straightforward steps.
content.step_1: Provide the path of the {{FileFormatUp}} file to an instance of the {{TextSignature}} class.
content.step_2: Invoke the Search method to retrieve all signatures within the document.
content.step_3: Delete one or more of the retrieved signatures.
content.step_4: Examine the results of the document processing.

code_1.content: Discover how to remove all barcode signatures embedded within a document.

code_1.comment_3: Evaluate the outcome of the deletion process
